title: The Cries of A Thousand Men Who’ve Been Shrunken

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Disable your curse of being tiny, allowing you to gain basic defense and deal a powerful attack to two players each night (1 man remaining only, can only activate if your curser is dead)
-Weep for the fallen, making all actions against you fail (100 men or below only)
-Shout at a player, distracting them for a second, making their action process last (300+ men only)
-Swarm a player and stab their ankles, causing them to be RBd that night (500+ men only)
-Swarm a player and crawl up their nose to stab their brain, killing them (800+ men only)
-Initiate war against a player’s home, attacking your target and dealing a basic attack to all direct visitors (1000 men only)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You are comprised of 1 thousand tiny men. Basic attacks kill 1 man, powerful attacks kill 10, unstoppable attacks kill 100, and Overkill+ and hangings kill 500 men
-Can only spawn if coven is in the game
-One random coven member will be designated as your “curser”. Killing them will allow you to activate your first ability

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: Goal: Be the direct cause of your curser’s death, and live to see the coven be eliminated
